title: Beauty Who Loved The Beast
description: Impoverished Marabelle O'Ceallighe had been raised under the influence of a secret society in Ireland. Her reputation cast her as a criminal and a prime target to her adversaries. That was until a short while after her twentieth birthday a temperamental stranger kidnapped her and claimed she was the lost princess he was destined to marry. One Beast, one Beauty, two individuals drawn together by faith, duty, and most of all . . . love.
author: Andromeda Oleastro
